ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Animals Expanded - Patch Pack[CE]
ModMetaData.author: NotooShabby
ModMetaData.description: Patch pack for Vanilla Animals Expanded that includes patches for A Dog Said and Combat Extended for the current releases of Vanilla Animals Expanded. Changelog: 30 / Dec / 19 - Update Extreme Desert to CE 1.8 30 / Dec / 19 - Update Desert to CE 1.8 30 / Dec / 19 - Update Tundra to CE 1.8 30 / Dec / 19 - Update Boreal Forest to CE 1.8 30 / Dec / 19 - Update Arid Shrubland to CE 1.8 29 / Dec / 19 - Update Tropical Rainforest to CE 1.8 28 / Dec / 19 - Update Livestock to CE 1.8 22 / Otc / 19 - Tundra, Ice Sheet & Boreal Forest Update 04 / Sep / 19 - Fixed cross reference error with A Dog Said 02 / Sep / 19 - Desert & Extreme Desert Update 16 / Aug / 19 - Arid Shrubland Update 03 / Aug / 19 - Initial Release Credits: Andross - Author for the original patch pack Oskar Potocki - Vanilla Animals Expanded Animal Collab Proj - Used some of their numbers
